Useful Tips for Lay on Hands in BG3

Do not solely rely on Lay on Hands: Lay on Hands is pretty useful but it doesn't need to be your only resource for healing. Try combining it with other healing spells, abilities, or items such as healing potions to ensure your survival in longer battles.
